data.eml:eml: A new species of bunchgrass lizard (Squamata: Phrynosomatidae) from the southern sky islands of the Sierra Madre Occidental, Mexico

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Grummer, Jared A., Bryson, Robert W. (2014): A new species of bunchgrass lizard (Squamata: Phrynosomatidae) from the southern sky islands of the Sierra Madre Occidental, Mexico. Zootaxa 3790 (3): 439-450, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3790.3.3
